notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, C.H., V.A.M. and C.M.L.; methodology, C.H., M.F., C.M.L. and V.A.M.; Writing—original draft preparation, V.A.M., E.P.C.; review and editing, M.a.d.H., C.M.L., M.F., U.R., U.G., E.B., C.S.; supervision, C.H., C.M.L. M.F.’s contribution and C.M.L.’s contribution are under their sole responsibility; statements and opinions are personal and cannot be regarded as representing the Commission’s or CHAFEA’s official positions.
